generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a Mercedes-Benz emblem visible on the hood, indicating the perspective is from a vehicle on the road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by a curb and bicycles parked along it.
- building: Several buildings are visible along the street, including multi-story structures with windows and architectural details.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead, showing red signals.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "Ladezone nur für über 2.8t" sign on the right and directional signs on the left.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street and in the background, providing shade and greenery.
- person: A person is visible crossing the street in the middle distance, wearing a pink shirt and light-colored pants.
- car: Several cars are visible, including a black SUV in the middle of the road and other vehicles parked on the right side of the street.
- bicycle: Bicycles are parked on the left sidewalk, secured to a bike rack.
